fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Business and Industry, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Regional Policy, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives:
Copyright (2001), collective rights management (2014) & DSM (upcoming) Directive 
GDPR
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: International Federation of Reproduction Rights Organisations (IFRRO)
goals__remit: Reprobel is the Belgian central collective management organisation (CMO) for the collection and distribution of author & publisher remunerations rights in the field of reprography, education/research and public lending on the Belgian territory. Reprobel is cooperative company but with a non-for-profit goal and a legal collection monopoly. Reprobel is a full member of IFRRO.
